                                boolean alignedByColumn,
                                int labelFormatForDescriptionsList,
                                java.lang.String labelStyleForDescriptionsList,
                                MetaReference metaReference)
Parses members to create the ui elements equivalent to the view.

Parameters:
metaMembers - Meta members to be parsed
view - View containing the members.
isDescriptionsList - True if processing a descriptions list.
isGrouped - True if part of a group.
inputPropertyPrefix - Property prefix.
alignedByColumn - True if is aligned by column.
labelFormatForDescriptionsList - Label format for descriptions list.
labelStyleForDescriptionsList - Label Style for descriptions list.
metaReference - Associated meta reference. Might be null.
